name: GoStream
description: GoStream Technology Joint Stock Company, a fast-growing Vietnamese startup that provides multi-platform interactive livestream broadcasting for salespeople, marketers, and content creators. The products of GoStream are easy-to-use platforms for any type of user, even for those with little or no technical knowledge. It enables users to reach large audiences from different platforms (facebook, youtube, ecommerce) to increase visibility and get more views. Currently, the company is serving multiple corporate clients and facilitating over 100,000 livestreaming sessions daily.
